title: Please Help
body:
Im new to this forums or whatever but i need urgent help.
I cant play league of legends when i join a game the champ select goes well but when the game starts i get a "Failed to connect please check your internet connection" or smth and now i have a new folder on my desktop named "league of legends please" guys help

replies.body: That league of legends please folder sounds really odd.  Are you using any third party applications interacting with League?  It may be causing issues and blocking you from reaching the game server.
I can play now also i haven't gotten any new folders but i'm curious what was that folder?

Not really sure it doesn't sound official, you may want to put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can dig into this with you and figure it out together!
Sounds like the haxers that riot doenst care about found you, congrats :)
